info.name: TurkTicaret API Collection
info.description: TurkTicaret API Collection for interacting with the TurkTicaret backend services

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for login and registration

request.description: Register a new user account
request.name: Register

request.description: Login with email and password to get authentication token
request.name: Login

request.description: Logout user and revoke authentication token
request.name: Logout

item.name: User Management
item.description: Complete user management system including profile, addresses, and settings

item.name: User Profile
item.description: User profile management endpoints

request.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information
request.name: Get Profile

request.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information
request.name: Update Profile

item.name: User Addresses
item.description: User address management with full CRUD operations for shipping and billing addresses

request.description: Get all addresses for the authenticated user (both shipping and billing addresses)
request.name: List User Addresses

request.description: Get user addresses with pagination support
request.name: List User Addresses with Pagination

query.description: Filter by address type (shipping or billing)

request.description: Get addresses filtered by type (shipping or billing)
request.name: List Addresses by Type

query.description: Filter to show only default addresses

request.description: Get only the default addresses for the user
request.name: List Default Addresses Only

request.description: Create a new billing address for the authenticated user
request.name: Create Billing Address

request.description: Create a new shipping address for the authenticated user
request.name: Create Shipping Address

request.description: Get details of a specific user address by UUID
request.name: Show Specific Address

body.raw:
{
  "type": "billing",
  "is_default": true,
  "first_name": "John Updated",
  "last_name": "Doe Updated",
  "company": "Updated Company Ltd",
  "address_line_1": "789 Updated Street",
  "address_line_2": "Floor 5",
  "city": "Istanbul",
  "state": "Marmara",
  "postal_code": "34100",
  "country_uuid": "{{country_uuid}}",
  "phone": "+90 555 111 2233"
}

request.description: Update an existing user address
request.name: Update Address

request.description: Partially update an address (only specified fields)
request.name: Update Address Partially

request.description: Set a specific address as the default address
request.name: Set Address as Default

request.description: Delete a specific user address (soft delete)
request.name: Delete Address

item.name: User Settings
item.description: User settings management endpoints

request.description: Get the authenticated user's settings
request.name: Get User Settings

request.description: Create or update user settings
request.name: Create/Update User Settings

request.description: Update user notification preferences
request.name: Update Notification Settings

request.description: Update user password
request.name: Update Password

request.description: Update user preferences
request.name: Update User Preferences

response.name: Success Response

{
  "name": "iPhone 15 Pro",
  "description": "Latest iPhone model with advanced features",

  "price": 129900,
  "stock_quantity": 50,
  "image_path": "/images/products/iphone-15-pro.jpg",
  "is_active": true,
  "category_uuid": "{{category_uuid}}"
}

response.name: Success Response

request.name: Add Multiple Items

request.name: Add Same Product Again

item.description: Test error handling and validation

request.description: Try to add product with invalid UUID - should fail

request.name: Add Zero Quantity

request.name: Add Excessive Quantity

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Try to remove product that's not in cart
request.name: Remove Non-existent Product

response.name: Success Response
